original_title: Kung Fu Masters 7: Kung Fu Monkey
overview: The dark creature known as Nian is back and it's up to the chosen twelve to stop it. To defeat Nian the great powers of the Kung Fu monkey must be called upon to train Polaris,  a young boy who is the future of his land. The kung fu monkey will make sure the boy is ready to face the great Nian when the time to defend the world comes.
title: Kung Fu Masters 7: Kung Fu Monkey
